cu.explanation_en: Setting mcc to an out-of-range value (1000) will cause invalid PLMN configuration and network registration failure.

du.explanation_en: Setting nrofDownlinkSlots to an out-of-range value (100) will cause invalid TDD configuration and frame structure issues.
du.explanation_zh: 將 nrofDownlinkSlots 設定為超出範圍的值 (100)，會導致無效的 TDD 配置，並造成幀結構問題。
